attributes.action: Stop the ULEZ expansion. Roll back the congestion charge.
attributes.additional_details: During the pandemic many people have been on survival mode. Many have lost their jobs or lost income. It's unfair to charge them £12.50 a day or expect them to buy a new car in these tough times.
attributes.background: Stop the ulez expansion in October and roll back the congestion charge to its original times. People dont have money to pay times are tough.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the Mayor of London.

You can find out how to petition the GLA

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
